A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: So bad.\n\nI'm not a Star Wars basement-dweller zealot\, but I am a nerd person. I like films like Star Wars because of nerding. The problem is that this film was so stupid\, and made zero attempt to be a science fiction film. I wanted a fun space movie\, instead I got beach alien lactation. I couldn't care less about what they did or didn't do with Luke's character. I just wish the movie hadn't been so awful. There's no way a competent villain or a competent rebellion would have done ANYTHING that they did in this movie.
